text: This is a list of freshwater fish species found in Sumatra, Indonesia. The listing below is based on the taxonomic treatment of Joseph S. Nelson's Fishes of the World, 5th edition. ==Order Carcharhiniformes== ===Family Carcharhinidae=== *Carcharhinus leucas (Müller & Henle, 1839) ==Order Pristiformes== ===Family Pristidae=== *Pristis pristis (Linnaeus, 1758) ==Order Myliobatiformes== ===Family Dasyatidae=== *Fluvitrygon kittipongi Vidthayanon & Roberts, 2005 *Fluvitrygon signifer Compagno & Roberts, 1982 *Fluvitrygon oxyrhyncha (Sauvage, 1878) *Urogymnus polylepis (Bleeker, 1852) ==Order Osteoglossiformes== ===Family Osteoglossidae=== *Scleropages formosus (Müller & Schlegel, 1844) ===Family Notopteridae=== *Chitala borneensis (Bleeker, 1851) *Chitala hypselonotus (Bleeker, 1851) *Chitala lopis (Bleeker, 1851) *Notopterus notopterus (Pallas, 1769) ==Order Elopiformes== ===Family Megalopidae=== *Megalops cyprinoides (Broussonet, 1782) ==Order Anguilliformes== ===Family Anguillidae=== *Anguilla bengalensis (Gray, 1831) *Anguilla bicolor McClelland, 1844 ===Family Muraenidae=== *Gymnothorax tile
